trans-unit.source: When applied to a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> object, enables an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> object to discover custom <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Quando aplicado a um objeto do <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" />, permite que um objeto do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> descubra objetos do <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext" /> personalizados.

trans-unit.source: The type of the reflection context.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de contexto de reflexão.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext" /> type.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> com o tipo de <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the custom <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância do objeto de <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the custom reflection context.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do contexto de reflexão personalizado.
